data.name: Rocket Mania Deluxe
data.detailed_description: Can you become master of pyrotechnics?  Twist and turn the fuses of to link a burning match to one or more rockets, then watch the sparks fly. Upgrade your rockets by collecting coins along the way. Keep watch of your time! You must set off your fireworks by dawn, or the show is over.
data.about_the_game: Can you become master of pyrotechnics?  Twist and turn the fuses of to link a burning match to one or more rockets, then watch the sparks fly. pc_requirements.minimum: Minimum Requirements: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP, 128 MB RAM, 500MHz or faster, DirectX: 7.0
